H0.text: Which film starring Steve McQueen featured a car chase through the streets of San Francisco. The Towering Inferno

H1.text: Which film starring Steve McQueen featured a car chase through the streets of San Francisco. The Getaway

H2.text: Which film starring Steve McQueen featured a car chase through the streets of San Francisco. Papillon

H3.text: Which film starring Steve McQueen featured a car chase through the streets of San Francisco. Bullitt

A4.text: It featured an unprecedented (and endlessly imitated) car chase through San Francisco.
